Posts.Content: Jun 15, 2010 10:34PM joanngil wrote: I have had 2 treatments of TCH so far - my third treatment will be next week - I had a bilateral mastectomy at the end of March , starting chemo 5/12 , and I have not worked since March - On the bad days , i am soooo glad to be off from work - on the good days , i feel guilty being off - My oncologist says that most of us do not work through this regimen and if i want to be off till the end of my treatments  , i can stay off till the end - i am just wondering what everyone else is doing - are you planning to be off for the whole chemo treatment ?  What are your plans for return to work ?  Please let me know.  Thanks. Joanngil
